Title: Announcing the end of support for Node.js 12.x in the AWS SDK for JavaScript (v3) | Amazon Web Services

Title: Cesium Story Depicts Damage in Ukraine
Description: A new Cesium Story by Hidenori Watanave and Taichi Furuhash shows damaged buildings, refugees, and Russian convoys in Ukraine with 3D photogrammetry models and satellite imagery, all shown in geospatial context.

Title: Why are tools such as Docker and Kubernetes written in Go and not C#? : csharp
Description: A lot of new tools that devs use seem to be written in Go. But why not C#? I know that C# and .Net is more than capable. Is it a lack of that kind of culture? How can we foster a more open source culture because it still seems like a lot of devs have old prejudices towards C# and .Net. I think having more interesting and useful open source tools written in C# would go a long way to change perceptions.

Title: Pong
Description:
Here is a link to full schematics.
Thanks to whoever made this.  I just found a few issues with it.
The CLK input to the 7474 on page 2 should be HRESET, not CLK.  Pin 5 of the 555's on pages 5 and 6 should be connected
to the capacitor.  Also some of the nodes are inconsistently labeled.

Title: Why are tools such as Docker and Kubernetes written in Go and not C#? : csharp
Description: A lot of new tools that devs use seem to be written in Go. But why not C#? I know that C# and .Net is more than capable. Is it a lack of that kind of culture? How can we foster a more open source culture because it still seems like a lot of devs have old prejudices towards C# and .Net. I think having more interesting and useful open source tools written in C# would go a long way to change perceptions.
